origin_description: He was born Kal-El on the planet Krypton, before being rocketed to Earth as an infant by his scientist father Jor-El, moments before Krypton's destruction.
superpowers: Solar energy absorption and healing factor, solar flare and heat vision, solar invulnerability, flight
catch_phrase: Look, up in the sky, it's a bird, it's a plane, it's Superman!

origin_description: Former special ops agent who gained the ability to manipulate shadows after a failed experiment with dark matter.
superpowers: Shadow manipulation, invisibility in darkness, silent movement, enhanced agility
catch_phrase: You won't see me coming—until it's too late.

origin_description: An electrical engineer struck by a freak lightning storm infused with experimental energy particles.
superpowers: Electricity control, electromagnetic pulses, super speed in short bursts

origin_description: A climate scientist turned superhero after an arctic expedition unlocked ancient cryogenic abilities.
superpowers: Cryokinesis, ice armor generation, snowstorm creation

origin_description: A firefighter exposed to alien fire spores that altered his DNA forever.
A gifted illusionist who discovered a magical relic that made her illusions real.
catch_phrase: Everything you see is a lie—except your defeat.

origin_description: Exosuit engineer who built the ultimate suit of armor after surviving a lab explosion.
superpowers: Super strength, impenetrable armor, built-in weapons

origin_description: A sound engineer caught in a sonic experiment gone wrong, gaining control over all frequencies.
catch_phrase: Hear that? It’s the sound of your defeat.

origin_description: A geologist who became one with the Earth's core during a mysterious seismic event.
superpowers: Earth manipulation, super strength, seismic stomp
catch_phrase: The Earth rumbles when justice walks!

origin_description: A cosmic explorer blessed with stardust powers after being lost in a galactic storm.
superpowers: Teleportation, starlight beams, spaceflight, energy manipulation
catch_phrase: Born from the stars, destined to shine!
